title: #BecauseMiami: Banned in Coral Gables
description:
Hurricane Ian has gone through the west coast of Florida. Dan and Billy Corben discuss the political impacts. We also have the legendary national opinion columnist Leonard Pitts Jr., who's going to retire at the end of the year. Plus, Billy's new movie, "God Forbid", has been banned from screening at the University of Miami. Did the alumnus take the news well?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
